eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 09:25 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:28 PM SEP 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for The Saint Johns Police Department.  The Saint Johns Police Department is looking for 40 year old Daniel Burdick. Daniel is a white male, 6 feet 1 inches tall, 178 pounds, with blue eyes and blond hair. Daniel was last seen driving a white in color 2019 Toyota Yaris bearing Arizona license plate CNK0083 near the 2200 block of West 4th Street South. He is believed to be wearing a t-shirt; orange jacket and blue jeans. Daniel suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become confused and easily lost. If you have seen Daniel, please contact the Saint Johns Police Department at 928-337-2440 or call 911. If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
